ai-patthana16.56:0.2_0: Having given the immaculateness of the Dhamma
ai-patthana16.56:1.1_0: One doesn’t give rise to repulsion of the teaching, nor does repulsion come up, because of not looking ahead.
ai-patthana16.56:1.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana16.56:2.1_0: Not for the sake of non-existence, not for the sake of inspecting the extent of the path gives rise to the shade of ignorance.
